name: @jejunetwork/indexer
description: Comprehensive blockchain indexer for Jeju with web UI

scripts.postinstall: node patches/apollo-fix.js 2>/dev/null || true && sqd codegen 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.dev:api: DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=23798 DB_NAME=indexer DB_USER=postgres DB_PASS=postgres bun lib/api/api-server.js
scripts.dev:processor: DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=23798 DB_NAME=indexer DB_USER=postgres DB_PASS=postgres RPC_ETH_HTTP=http://127.0.0.1:6546 bun lib/api/main.js
scripts.dev:graphql: DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=23798 DB_NAME=indexer DB_USER=postgres DB_PASS=postgres GQL_PORT=4350 sqd serve
scripts.db:ensure: docker compose up -d && sleep 3 && docker exec squid-db-1 psql -U postgres -c 'CREATE DATABASE indexer;' 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.dev:full: bun run build && bun run db:ensure && bun run db:migrate && concurrently --kill-others "bun run dev:processor" "bun run dev:graphql" "PORT=4355 bun run scripts/dev.ts" "bun run dev:api"
scripts.build: rm -rf lib && bun scripts/pre-build.ts && tsc && rm -rf lib/model && ln -s src/model lib/model && bun scripts/post-build.ts && bun build index.html --outdir dist/web --minify
